title: Malaysiaâ€™s ex-PM Mahathir quits Pejuang party he founded, picks GTA as new political platform | The Straits Times
snippet: Tun Dr Mahathir, 97, was one of 13 Pejuang members who sent in a notice to party secretary-general Amiruddin Hamzah on Friday, saying that they were leaving the party and will now continue their political journey with Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA), ...

title: Gerakan Tanah Air - Wikipedia
snippet: Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA, Homeland Movement or Homeland Party) is an alliance of Malay political parties, founded in August 2022 by former Prime Minister of Malaysia Mahathir Mohamad.

title: Gerakan Tanah Air
snippet: Gerakan Tanah Air (GTA), translated ... established in August 2022 by former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad to unite Malay political forces.[1][2] The alliance positioned itself as a vehicle for addressing perceived erosion ...

title: Mahathir's GTA to proceed with registration as party
snippet: Gerakan Tanah Air, a new political coalition led by former premier Dr Mahathir Mohamad which suffered a total defeat during its debut in the recent general election, will proceed with its plan to register as a party.
